overview: Patrick Plouvier started his career as a Controller with Ford of Europe (1979-1984), then joined the IDI group (1984-1986). He became an Executive at Coparis (1986-1990), before joining Partech International as partner (1990-1992), and then managed several venture capital missions in emerging markets. He joined CITA in 1999. Patrick Plouvier graduated from the Ecole Nationale SupÃ©rieure des Mines de Saint-Etienne and holds an MBA Degree from the Wharton School (Pennsylvania).
